game.name: DCS: F-5E Remastered
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The DCS: F-5E Tiger II Remastered is an enhanced version of the classic F-5E module, offering significant improvements to elevate your flight simulation experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The DCS: F-5E Tiger II Remastered is an enhanced version of the classic F-5E module, offering significant improvements to elevate your flight simulation experience.
